question: At the beginning of the meeting, there were 49 nurses and 65 artists. After two hours, 1/6 of the total number of people left. How many artists are left if 31 nurses stayed at the meeting?
answer:
There were a total of 49 nurses + 65 artists = <<49+65=114>>114 people who attended the meeting.
After two hours, 114 people * 1/6 = <<114*1/6=19>>19 people left the meeting.
This means 114 people - 19 people = <<114-19=95>>95 people stayed.
Out of the 95 who stayed, 95 people - 31 nurses = <<95-31=64>>64 were artists.
#### 64
